lines.text: This house began with murder. It will end the same way.
"Principio Et Finem Similia." I end as I began!
Don't you want to kiss me?

[Cutting a juicy pear with his knife and eating it as he talks]
A pear is the best fruit!
Every time you see her, you want to be rid of me.

[Seemingly ignoring her]
Lots of juice in a pear!
Well, you'll find out I'll not be got rid of so easily! Do you hear what I say?
You've got it all planned, haven't you? You're gonna marry her. You're gonna make her your wife, your baroness!
I like the feel of a pear! And when you're through with it...
[He carelessly tosses it across the room]

[as Anton lies dying in the well of the Black Room]
Goodbye, brother. There's nothing to fear now. The prophecy can't be fulfilled.
Perhaps you will come back from the dead to kill me?

[Playing chess]
Your attack is weak as your brother Gregor's was brilliant. Chess, by the way, was the only virtue I ever discovered in him.
I received a letter today from him from Warsaw. Most of it was devoted to begging me to send his love to you, Colonel.
His love to me? Well, if I have to accept it, I'd rather have it by post than any way I can think of.
